entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
